article.title: Local Events - Nashville U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about events presented by the Nashville U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Australia Market Brief for Education, Healthcare & Tourism

When: September 25-26, 2014

Where: TSU Avon Williams Campus – September 25

Nashville Convention & Visitors Corporation – September 26

Cost:FREE!

Register:​Healthcare–patrick.spence@trade.gov

Education–andrew.collier@trade.gov

Tourism–andrew.collier@trade.gov

The U.S. Department of Commerce (Nashville Export Assistance Center), with the Tennessee Small Business Development Center, and the Nashville Convention & Visitors Corporation will host Monique Roos, U.S. Consulate - Sydney, who will conduct a briefing, on how your organization can access the market in Australia. She is the Education, Healthcare & Tourism Sectors Specialist in Australia and will be available to answer your questions.

Ms. Monique Roos

Commercial Specialist

US Commercial Service

U.S. Department of Commerce | International Trade Administration

American Consulate General, Sydney

Level 59, MLC Centre, 19-29 Martin Place

Sydney NSW 2000 Australia

For More Information: Please contact Andrew Collier atandrew.collier@trade.govor 615-736-2224.


TSBDC Export Boot Camp

Cost: FREE!

This seminar will provide the nuts and bolts of information needed to become a successful exporter. Topics will include how to identify markets for your products, how to finance your export transaction, and how to mitigate economic political and financial risks. This is a free seminar but reservations are required and available on-line atwww.tsbdc.orgor by calling 615-898-2745. Please arrive and sign in 10 minutes prior to the startup of the seminar
